channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No cycling sign partly obscured by foliage, 23rd July
item.description:
Mini island at Green Lane and Drews Court. A footpath/alleyway leading from here going north down to the car park. The sign really needs to re-sited and bolted to the gate below where it will be clearly visible. Lots of lads just ride down the pathway at speed, they say they do see the existing sign! Accidents waiting to happen!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drews Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
